trends.news: Meta Claims Downloaded Porn at Center of AI Lawsuit Was for ‘Personal Use’. In a motion to dismiss filed earlier this week, Meta denied claims that employees had downloaded pornography from Strike 3 Holdings to train its artificial intelligence models.
